title: David Hartsough to address Resistance Studies Initiative Fall Speaker Series (University of Massachusetts Amherst)
text: ( Source : University of Massachusetts Amherst ) David Hartsough, author of 'Waging Peace - Global Adventures of a Lifelong Activist,' will address the Resistance Studies Initiative Fall Speaker Series on Monday, Oct. 26 from 4-5:15 p.m. in
